# Vedic Astrology Website - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
A comprehensive Vedic astrology (Kundli) website with Next.js 14+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

## Progress Checklist
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Next.js 14 project
- [x] Install required dependencies
- [x] Setup configuration files
- [x] Create core layout and theme
- [x] Build homepage sections (Hero, Features, How It Works, Testimonials)
- [x] Implement Kundli generation flow (Form, Processing, Dashboard)
- [x] Build dashboard components (Chart, Planets, Dasha, Yogas, Doshas, Remedies)
- [x] Setup API integration (Mock API)
- [x] Build Kundli Matching page
- [x] Build Daily Horoscope page
- [x] Build Panchang page
- [x] Build Numerology page
- [x] Build Dasha Calculator page
- [x] Build Transits page
- [x] Create Zustand stores
- [x] Update navigation with dropdowns
- [x] Add more UI polish and animations
- [x] Implement real API integration
- [x] Add authentication
- [x] Add PDF generation

## Tech Stack
- Framework: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript (strict mode)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Animations: Framer Motion
- State: Zustand
- Forms: React Hook Form + Zod
- Charts: Recharts
- Icons: Lucide React
